job.title: Airport Shuttle Bus Driver
job.description:
Are you a Class B Driver with a Passenger endorsement?

Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), a leading nationwide rental car outsourcing company, is currently hiring quality, team driven people to work as a Shuttle Bus Driver for our partners at the airport.

What you'll do

  • Provide friendly service and professionalism to our customers
  • Operate radio or similar device to communicate with other team members or management
  • Perform safe driving practices and maintain a timely shuttle route
  • Assist guests by lifting and carrying guest baggage on and off the shuttle van as needed
  • Periodically may be required to assist in other operational functions
  • Work under minimal supervision

Benefits:

  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Flexible schedule

What we require:

  • HS Diploma or GED
  • Class B license plus Passenger (P) Endorsement
  • A clean driving record
  • Valid DOT Medical Card
  • Flexible with schedule to work night, weekends and holidays as needed
  • Able to repetitively lift and carry up to 50 pounds on a regular basis

If you meet these job requirements, apply now. A recruiter will follow up to schedule an interview with qualified applicants.

job.title: Airport Rental Car Cleaner
job.description:
Do you enjoy late model cars, have a good attention to detail, and need a flexible schedule? Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), a leading nationwide rental car outsourcing company, is looking for high energy and team driven people to work as a Rental Car Cleaner for our partners on airport location.

What you'll be doing:

  • Efficiently and safely clean both the interior and exterior of vehicle
  • Check fuel level, warning lights and tire pressure. Fill all necessary fluids, refuel vehicle
  • Display amazing service and professionalism to our customers
  • Follow all company safety policies and procedures
  • Perform safe driving practices and follow verbal directions
  • Work under minimal supervision and have excellent time management skills

Benefits:

  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Flexible schedule

What we require:

  • Valid driver's license
  • 18 years of age or older
  • Must be flexible with schedule to work night, weekends and holidays as needed
  • Must be able to reach, stretch, bend and sit for long periods at a time

Do you enjoy late model cars, have a good attention to detail, and need a flexible schedule? Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), a leading nationwide rental car outsourcing company, is looking for high energy and team driven people to work as a Rental Car Cleaner for our partners on airport location.

What you'll be doing:

  • Efficiently and safely clean both the interior and exterior of vehicle
  • Check fuel level, warning lights and tire pressure. Fill all necessary fluids, refuel vehicle
  • Display amazing service and professionalism to our customers
  • Follow all company safety policies and procedures
  • Perform safe driving practices and follow verbal directions
  • Work under minimal supervision and have excellent time management skills

Benefits:

  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Flexible schedule

What we require:

  • Valid driver's license
  • 18 years of age or older
  • Must be flexible with schedule to work night, weekends and holidays as needed
  • Must be able to reach, stretch, bend and sit for long periods at a time

Do you enjoy late model cars, have a good attention to detail, and need a flexible schedule plus access to daily pay? Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), a leading nationwide rental car outsourcing company, is looking for high energy and team driven people to work as a Rental Car Cleaner for our partners on airport location.

What you'll be doing:

  • Efficiently and safely clean both the interior and exterior of vehicle
  • Check fuel level, warning lights and tire pressure. Fill all necessary fluids, refuel vehicle
  • Display amazing service and professionalism to our customers
  • Follow all company safety policies and procedures
  • Perform safe driving practices and follow verbal directions
  • Work under minimal supervision and have excellent time management skills

Benefits:

  • Weekly pay
  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Flexible schedule
  • This location is offering Daily pay access

What we require:

  • Valid driver's license
  • 18 years of age or older
  • Must be flexible with schedule to work night, weekends and holidays as needed
  • Must be able to reach, stretch, bend and sit for long periods at a time

job.description:
Have a passion for driving late model cars? Need a flexible schedule? Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), a leading nationwide rental car outsourcing company, is looking to hire committed and efficient people to work as a Rental Car Fleet Driver for our partners on airport location.

What you'll be doing:

  • Safely and quickly transport vehicles within the on airport site
  • Provide amazing service and professionalism to our customers
  • Work under minimal supervision and have excellent time management skills

Benefits:

  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Flexible schedule

  • Have experience driving a variety of vehicles
  • Able to adapt to changing schedules and tasks as required

job.title: Limpiador de Coches de Alquiler
job.description:
Te gustan los coches de ultimo modelo y tienes buena atencion a los detalles? Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), una empresa de subcontratacion de vehiculos de alquiler a nivel nacional, esta contratando personas de alta energia e impulsadas por equipos para que trabajen como limpiadores de vehiculos de alquiler para nuestros socios.

Que haras:

  • Limpiar y desinfectar el interior del vehiculo
  • Lavar, limpiar y secar el exterior del vehiculo
  • Revise el nivel de combustible, las luces de advertencia y la presion de los neumaticos. Llene todos los fluidos necesarios, reposte el vehiculo
  • Siga las politicas y los procedimientos de seguridad de la empresa
  • Realice practicas de conduccion segura y siga las instrucciones verbales de la gerencia

Beneficios:

  • Seguro medico
  • Seguro dental
  • Horario flexible

Requisitos

  • Debe tener 18 anos de edad o mas
  • Tener una licencia de conducir valida
  • Adaptese a horarios y tareas flexibles segun sea necesario
  • Capaz de estirarse, inclinarse y sentarse durante largos periodos de tiempo

Un reclutador hara un seguimiento para programar una entrevista con los solicitantes calificados.

[fusion_builder_container type="flex" hundred_percent="no" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="center center" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" overlay_color="" video_preview_image="" border_color="" border_style="solid" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" padding_left="" padding_right=""][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" layout="1_1" background_position="left top" background_color="" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" spacing="yes" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" padding_top="" padding_right="" padding_bottom="" padding_left="" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" class="" id="" animation_type="" animation_speed="0.3" animation_direction="left" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" center_content="no" last="true" min_height="" hover_type="none" link="" border_sizes_top="" border_sizes_bottom="" border_sizes_left="" border_sizes_right="" first="true"][fusion_text] Have a passion for driving cars? Are you good at keeping things organized? MLS is seeking quality, high energy, team driven people to work as a Rental Car Flagger for our airport location. What you'll do:
  • Identify vehicles which are on system hold for turn-back, time or mileage, recall, or any other special lock and verify their movement to the proper lot location
  • Identify and tag vehicles that have been flagged for grounding or preventative maintenance and verify their movement to the proper lot location
  • Keep lot organized for ease of access and traffic flow
  • Work under minimal supervision and have excellent time management skills
Benefits:
  • Health, Dental insurance
  • Flexible schedule
What we require:
  • Valid driver's license
  • 18 years of age or older
  • Must be flexible with schedule to work night, weekends and holidays as needed
  • Must be able to reach, stretch, bend and sit for long periods at a time
Apply now, a recruiter will follow up to schedule an interview with qualified applicants. [/fusion_text][/fusion_builder_column][/fusion_builder_row][/fusion_builder_container]

job.title: Rental Car Return Agent
job.description:
If you enjoy working outside and meeting new people from around the world daily, Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), a leading nationwide rental car outsourcing company, is currently hiring quality, team driven people to work as a Rental Car Return Agent for our partners at the airport.

What you'll do:

  • Greet customers when they are dropping off their rental car
  • Expedite the car return process so customers can get to their destination quickly and easily
  • Resolve customer issues and concerns professionally and be able to explain charges on the invoice
  • Secure vehicle keys from the customer upon return and confirm necessary documentation and checks are performed as needed
  • Ensure car is ready for the next customer by inspecting and recording for new damages and checking gas levels and mileage

Benefits:

  • Health, Dental insurance
  • Flexible schedule

What we require:

  • High School diploma or GED
  • Valid driver's license (non CDL)
  • 18 years of age or older
  • Flexibility to work days, evenings, overnights, weekends and holidays
  • Basic computer skills (typing, data entry)
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with a variety of tasks

Extra points:

  • 6 months of customer service and/or sales experience preferred
  • Previous experience in baggage handling at an airport or warehouse or has work in customer-facing roles (cashier, call center, retail)

If you meet these requirements, Apply now. A recruiter will follow up to schedule an interview with qualified applicants.

job.title: Rental Car Site Shift Supervisor
job.description:
Are you able to manage people while driving performance success?

Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), a leading nationwide rental car outsourcing company, is looking for the next great leader as a Rental Car Shift Supervisor at our airport location.

What you'll be doing:

  • Lead your team to ensure they complete daily tasks and are meeting performance standard levels
  • Provide training to new hires providing the necessary tools and information to foster success
  • Provide amazing service and professionalism to our customers
  • Follow all company safety policies and procedures and help drive a safety focus
  • Represent the company values, vision and culture to all associates
  • Work under minimal supervision and have excellent time management skills
  • Follow direction of Management and able to reach, stretch, bend and sit for long periods at a time
  • Provide needed reports on performance targets and maintain the operation
  • Able to adapt to changing schedules and perform other job-related duties as required

Benefits:

  • Medical insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Vision insurance
  • Opportunity for advancement

What we require:

  • Valid driver's license (non CDL)
  • A clean driving record is great but not required
  • 21 years of age or older
  • HS Diploma or GED
  • Minimum 1 to 2 years of previous supervisory experience
  • Have experience driving a variety of vehicles
  • Flexible with schedule to work night, weekends and holidays as needed

job.description:
Have the ability to manage people while driving performance success?

Managed Labor Solutions, a nationwide leading provider of rental car outsource services, is seeking an enthusiastic and experienced Site Manager for a fast-paced environment in the auto cleaning services industry for our location at the airport.

This position is an excellent opportunity with advancement possibilities for demonstrated leaders who believe in providing top-notch service in a safe and fun work environment. Qualified candidates will have prior management and leadership experience in a rental car or other fast-paced, similar work environment.

What you'll be doing:

  • Interact in a professional manner with customers

Our benefits:

  • Vision insurance
  • Advancement opportunities nationwide

  • One (1) year or more of management experience
  • HS Diploma or GED (Associate or Bachelor's degree preferred).

job.title: Rental Car Utility Attendant
job.description:
Do you like late model cars, have a good attention to detail and enjoy working outdoors? Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), a leading nationwide rental car outsourcing company, is currently hiring quality, high energy, driven people for one of our partner locations.

What you'll be doing:

  • Safely transport a variety of vehicles from one location to another on the lot
  • Check actual inventory of vehicles and monitor the car lot supply
  • Monitor the movement and cleanliness of vehicles
  • Efficiently and safely clean both the interior and exterior of vehicle
  • Check fuel level, warning lights and tire pressure. Fill all necessary fluids, refuel vehicle
  • Process any vehicle upgrades and/or exchanges
  • Inventory new car information into the computer system
  • Work under minimal supervision

Our benefits:

  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Flexible schedule
  • This location is offering Daily pay access

What we require:

  • Valid driver's license
  • A clean driving record is great but not required
  • 18 years of age or older
  • Flexible with schedule to work night, weekends and holidays as needed
  • Able to reach, stretch, bend and sit for long periods at a time
  • Excellent time management skills

job.title: Regional Manager
job.description:
Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), a leading nationwide rental car outsourcing company, is looking for a Regional Manager to drive the long-term market strategy by leading and developing a team of leaders to meet profit and sales goals consistently. Reporting to a Regional Vice President, they oversee all district field sales and operations activity. They prioritize relationships with associates and customers to stay connected to industry trends and best practices and adjust their district strategies accordingly.

  • Develop, communicate and implement the vision for the market, including short and long-term operations plans to grow market share and increase brand awareness.
  • Monitor monthly performance against sales and operations plans and make appropriate adjustments to meet objectives.
  • Keep current on what the competition is doing and make appropriate recommendations (pricing, services, product offerings) to ensure the company is in line with or ahead of the competition; Work with field sales to identify and develop new business relationships and opportunities
  • Oversee Profit and Loss for the district, ensuring that revenue goals are met by managing expenses, maximizing profits, and minimizing losses; conduct financial reviews with leaders monthly for transparency.
  • Lead through engagement and motivation, understanding the needs of a primarily mobile workforce and creating a culture where everyone is inspired to do their best.
  • Create a positive and rewarding environment that encourages retention; work with leaders to foster a culture that drives a terrific, memorable, and effortless customer experience in all sites.
  • Partner with national leaders to standardize best practices, implement the playbook in their region and drive change management and adoption in the Field.
  • Ensure market leaders complete the annual Talent Recruiting Process for their direct reports, so the team comprises high-performing associates and under-performing associates are coached.
  • All other duties as assigned.

Benefits:

  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Vision insurance

What you'll need

  • Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) or a degree in a related field
  • Valid state-issued driver's license
  • 6+ years of leadership experience in operations and sales; auto aftermarket experience preferred
  • Strong knowledge of sales, marketing, and operations techniques/expertise
  • Ability to indirectly lead, coach, and achieve results through others and develop associates to meet their individual career goals in tandem with the organization's KPIs
  • Ability to travel up to 50%

  • Oversee Profit and Loss for the district, ensuring that revenue goals are met by managing expenses, maximizing profits, and minimizing losses; conduct financial reviews with leaders monthly for transparency.
  • Lead through engagement and motivation, understanding the needs of a primarily mobile workforce and creating a culture where everyone is inspired to do their best.
  • Create a positive and rewarding environment that encourages retention; work with leaders to foster a culture that drives a terrific, memorable, and effortless customer experience in all sites.
  • Partner with national leaders to standardize best practices, implement the playbook in their region and drive change management and adoption in the Field.
  • Ensure market leaders complete the annual Talent Recruiting Process for their direct reports, so the team comprises high-performing associates and under-performing associates are coached.
  • All other duties as assigned.

Benefits:

  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Vision insurance

What you'll need

  • Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) or a degree in a related field
  • Valid state-issued driver's license
  • 6+ years of leadership experience in operations and sales; auto aftermarket experience preferred
  • Strong knowledge of sales, marketing, and operations techniques/expertise
  • Ability to indirectly lead, coach, and achieve results through others and develop associates to meet their individual career goals in tandem with the organization's KPIs
  • Ability to travel up to 50%

  • Display amazing service and professionalism to our customers
  • Follow all company safety policies and procedures
  • Perform safe driving practices and follow verbal directions
  • Work under minimal supervision and have excellent time management skills

Benefits:

  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Flexible schedule

What we require:

  • Valid driver's license
  • 18 years of age or older
  • Must be flexible with schedule to work night, weekends and holidays as needed
  • Must be able to reach, stretch, bend and sit for long periods at a time

job.title: Limpiador de Coches de Alquiler
job.description:
Te gustan los coches de ultimo modelo y tienes buena atencion a los detalles? Managed Labor Solutions (MLS), una empresa de subcontratacion de vehiculos de alquiler a nivel nacional, esta contratando personas de alta energia e impulsadas por equipos para que trabajen como limpiadores de vehiculos de alquiler para nuestros socios.

Que haras:

  • Limpiar y desinfectar el interior del vehiculo
  • Lavar, limpiar y secar el exterior del vehiculo
  • Revise el nivel de combustible, las luces de advertencia y la presion de los neumaticos. Llene todos los fluidos necesarios, reposte el vehiculo
  • Siga las politicas y los procedimientos de seguridad de la empresa
  • Realice practicas de conduccion segura y siga las instrucciones verbales de la gerencia

Beneficios:

  • Seguro medico
  • Seguro dental
  • Horario flexible

Requisitos

  • Debe tener 18 anos de edad o mas
  • Tener una licencia de conducir valida
  • Adaptese a horarios y tareas flexibles segun sea necesario
  • Capaz de estirarse, inclinarse y sentarse durante largos periodos de tiempo
